description: Provides a Hetzner Cloud Volume attachment to attach a Volume to a Hetzner Cloud Server. Deleting a Volume Attachment will detach the Volume from the Server.

tfcfnid.description: Internal identifier for tracking resource changes. Do not use.

Automount.description: Automount the volume upon attaching it.

ServerId.description:
Server to attach the Volume to.
- `automount` - (Optional, bool) Automount the volume upon attaching it.

VolumeId.description:
ID of the Volume.
- `server_id` - (Required, int) Server to attach the Volume to.
- `automount` - (Optional, bool) Automount the volume upon attaching it.
